dashboard.title: View All Tasks Across Workspaces
dashboard.description: Access a comprehensive list of all tasks from the workspaces you've joined, enabling a quick overview of your workload across projects.

dashboard.title: See Tasks with Upcoming Deadlines
dashboard.description: Stay on top of important deadlines by viewing tasks that are due today, ensuring no task slips through the cracks.

dashboard.title: View Tasks Assigned to You
dashboard.description: Focus on tasks that require your attention by viewing a dedicated list of tasks assigned to you by other team members.

dashboard.title: Quick Task Creation
dashboard.description: Create tasks instantly with minimal effort, allowing you to capture ideas or action items on the go without interrupting your workflow.

workspace.title: Create New Workspaces
workspace.description: Start a new workspace for any project, team, or initiative, giving you a fresh environment to organize and manage tasks.

workspace.title: Update Workspace Details
workspace.description: Keep your workspace up to date by modifying the workspace title, description, or other essential details as your project evolves.

workspace.title: Delete Workspaces
workspace.description: Remove workspaces that are no longer needed, keeping your workspace list clean and manageable.

workspace.title: Manage User Privileges
workspace.description: Assign roles and permissions to users within your workspace, ensuring the right people have access to the right tasks.

workspace.title: View Participant Workspaces Only
workspace.description: Streamline your focus by viewing only the workspaces where you are an active participant, avoiding clutter from irrelevant projects.

workspace.title: Create and Update Tasks
workspace.description: Add new tasks or update existing ones with detailed information like title, assignee, due date, priority, and more, keeping the team aligned.

workspace.title: Delete or Duplicate Tasks
workspace.description: Manage tasks efficiently by deleting unnecessary ones or duplicating them for recurring actions or similar tasks.

workspace.title: Customize Task Attributes
workspace.description: Tasks can be as detailed as you need, with attributes such as title, assignee, due date, priority, labels, comments, and description, giving you full control.

workspace.title: Drag-and-Drop Task Management
workspace.description: Easily move tasks between columns or rearrange their order with a simple drag-and-drop interface, keeping your board organized.

workspace.title: Create and Modify Columns
workspace.description: Set up your Kanban board with custom columns to fit your workflow, and modify column names as your project progresses.

workspace.title: Delete All Tasks in a Column
workspace.description: Quickly clean up your workspace by deleting all tasks from a specific column with a single action, perfect for end-of-sprint cleanups.

workspace.title: Search Tasks Within Workspace
workspace.description: Quickly find specific tasks within a workspace using a powerful search feature, streamlining task management and improving efficiency.

workspace.title: Modify Task Positions
workspace.description: Adjust the position of tasks within columns to prioritize work and maintain focus on the most critical items.

workspace.title: Unified Kanban, Chat, and Calendar View
workspace.description: Get a holistic view of your project by accessing the Kanban board, chat, and calendar all on the same page, reducing the need for context switching.

workspace.title: Live Participant View in Chat
workspace.description: See which team members are currently active and available in the chat section, facilitating real-time communication and collaboration.

calendar.title: View All Workspace Tasks in Calendar
calendar.description: Visualize all tasks from your workspaces in a calendar format, making it easier to track deadlines, milestones, and important dates.

chats.title: Group Chat with Workspace Participants
chats.description: Collaborate efficiently by engaging in real-time group chats with your workspace members, keeping communication streamlined and project-related.

chats.title: Chat Search Bar
chats.description: Easily search through chat messages with a dedicated search bar, allowing you to find specific conversations or topics quickly.

settings.title: Update User Profile
settings.description: Easily update your profile with a new image, username, or password, ensuring your account is always up to date.

settings.title: Change Password
settings.description: Secure your account by updating your password regularly, with a simple and intuitive password change process.

community.title: Create and Manage Communities
community.description: Build and join communities within your workspace for more focused collaboration, with options to create, join, or leave communities.

community.title: Set Admin Upon Leaving a Community
community.description: Ensure smooth transitions by setting a new admin when leaving a community, maintaining continuity and leadership within the group.
